Package cart

Class Product

java.lang.Object
cart.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Product>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Taxed, Taxfree
public abstract class Product extends Object implements Comparable<Product>
Represents a grocery product for sale.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Waseem Alkasbutrus
Licensed under:
Gnu General PUblic License 3.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final String
    name
    The name of this product
    protected int
    quantity
    If zero, indicates this instance is on the store shelf or website If positive, is the number of units in the shopping cart
    protected final double
    unitCost
    The cost of one unit of this product

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Product product) throws NullPointerException
      Compares two products by their price
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Product>
      Parameters:
      product - The product to be compared
      Returns:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this product is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified product.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the specified product is null
      ClassCastException - If the specified product's type prevents it from being compared to this product.
      Since:
      1.0
